com.mortardata.project
Class EmbeddedMortarProject

java.lang.Object
  com.mortardata.project.EmbeddedMortarProject

public class EmbeddedMortarProject
extends Object

Tools for deploying Embedded Mortar Projects to the Mortar Service (via github).

See Also:
Using Your Own Source Control

Method Detail

deployToMortar

public void deployToMortar(String githubUsername,
                           String githubPassword)
                    throws IOException
Deploy the code in this EmbeddedMortarProject to Mortar onto the master branch.

Parameters:
githubUsername - Username for github user associated with Mortar account (used to sync code to backing Mortar github repo)
githubPassword - Password for github user associated with Mortar account (used to sync code to backing Mortar github repo)
Throws:
IOException - if unable to sync code to Mortar

deployToMortar

public void deployToMortar(String githubUsername,
                           String githubPassword,
                           String targetBranch)
                    throws IOException
Deploy the code in this EmbeddedMortarProject to Mortar onto a specified branch.

Parameters:
githubUsername - Username for github user associated with Mortar account (used to sync code to Mortar's mirror github repo)
githubPassword - Password for github user associated with Mortar account (used to sync code to Mortar's mirror github repo)
targetBranch - target branch to which deployment should go in Mortar's mirror github repo
Throws:
IOException

getGitMirrorURL

public String getGitMirrorURL()
                       throws IOException
Get the URL of the backing git mirror for this EmbeddedMortarProject.

Returns:
https URL of git mirror
Throws:
IOException - if unable to load git mirror URL from .mortar-project-remote
